description.value: This value set includes example Consenting Party role codes.

definition.value: An entity or an entity's delegatee who is the grantee in an agreement such as a consent for services, advanced directive, or a privacy consent directive in accordance with jurisdictional, organizational, or patient policy.
An entity which accepts certain rights or authority from a grantor.
An entity which agrees to confer certain rights or authority to a grantee.
A party to whom some right or authority is granted by a delegator.
A party that grants all or some portion its right or authority to another party.
